runs.comm: Oh well ... Gambhir starts with a boundary. It was short and outside off, he stayed adjacent and cut it through covers
similar delivery, perhaps a touch fuller and Gambhir attempts another cut but the ball flashes past the bat
pushed across Gambhir who allows it sail past him
full in length, moving across Gambhir who tries to dab it to third man - there is a slip in place - and is beaten. He then suggests he should have punched it in the V
tapped close on the off side, towards backward point and they rush across; Rohit dives to get back in the crease
full in length, on the middle and off line, defended to the on side of the pitch
full and on the middle and leg, whipped to deep midwicket
on a length, around the off stump, pushed back to the bowler. Wilson, the keeper, is standing up to the stumps
full pitched around off stump and Rohit uses his bottom-hand to chip it over extra cover and the ball runs to the boundary
back of length, straightening on the middle and off, pushed towards mid-on
full again, just outside off, driven to cover
walks down the track and square drives another full delivery, will get two runs as cover point takes some pace off it
low dipping full toss, Rohit shapes to drive but makes contact with the bottom of the bat and the ball rolls to mid-on
length delivery outside off stump, pushed to cover point
back of length, cutting in with bounce, Rohit wants to punch it on the up but the ball bounces more than he thinks and he had to take out the bottom-hand off the bat handle and pushes it to cover
short in length again, this time Rohit drag pulls it with bit of top edge and the ball lands safely in deep midwicket
charges down the track and slashes it away to wide third man.
lovely bouncing length delivery that holds its line outside off and beats Rohit ...
full in length outside off, GAmbhir goes for the big hit over mid-on but makes contact with the toe end of the bat. Still, it falls safely behind mid-on
back of length outside off, cut away to third man
short in length, coming into Rohit who tucks it to square leg.
back of length on the off and middle line, Gambhir stays completely side-on, adjacent to the line and cuts well but backward point fielder dives to his right to stop
Despite Wilson standing up to the stumps for Kevin, Gambhir walks down the track, reaches out to carve it high over covers. One bounce and over the ropes.
full and outside off, sliced away to third man
Six over third man! It was short and bouncing outside off, Gambhir upper cut it deliberately and it sails over third man
shifts his line to the leg stump, changes the length to very full, flicked to deep square leg
slips down leg and Rohit misses to connect with the glance but it rushes off the thigh pad to the fine-leg boundary
no foot movement as Rohit tries to lift the full delivery over cover and gets a thickish outside edge to left of third man
short in length, superbly struck off the back foot but can't beat backward point.
backs away a touch and runs it down to third man for a single.
full in length, tilting in towards middle stump, defended to the on side of the pitch
leans across to push another full length delivery to cover
length delivery on the off stump, opens the bat-face to steer it down to third man
drags this one short of length and Gambhir cuts to deep point
with the short fine-leg in place, Rohit lunges across towards the off side to paddle-scoop a length delivery from the off stump to fine-leg boundary
overpitches outside off, driven crisply to left of long-off
pushes it quick and well outside off, cut away to backward point
slows up the pace, flights it full, defended to cover
flighted full outside off, Rohit plays ala Laxman, leans across to wrist it through wide midwicket
floated full on the stumps, flicked through midwicket
leans forward to whip it to deep square leg
short in length, turning outside off stump, cut to deep point region
short in length outside off, hit on the up to deep cover region
full and pushed across Gambhir who shapes to play but decides to leave it for the keeper standing up
angling away from Gambhir who is beaten, trying to late cut it
in that zone outside off again, very full, tries to steer it away but can't put bat to batl
And so, after missing a few deliveries outside off, Gambhir shuffles to the off side, tries to play a big shot but edges it to short fine-leg region
Rohit leans forward to pick a full delivery and chip it high and to the left of long-on for a fine boundary
from round the stumps, short in length, skidding in, Gambhir arches back to cut it past backward point. Botha makes a fine diving stop near the ropes
flighted full outside off, slower through the air as well, driven to sweeper cover
on the leg and middle, on a length, paddled away to short fine-leg

fab inside-out lofted extra cover drive. That's the shot he plays so well against the spinners. He chipped down the track, stayed adjacent to the line of the flighted delivery and lifted it over extra cover
wide down the leg side
threatens to come down, stays where he is and tucks it to backward square leg
flatter, on the middle and off line, flicked past square leg
flighted full on the middle and off, pushed back to the bowler
Rohit goes down town. The long-on and the long-off fielder dive simultaneously and the long-on pushes it back in but the fielders collide in the process. Could have got really painful.
goes back to clip it to backward square leg
on the middle, turning in, worked past square leg for couple of runs
pauses prior to the release, and floats it on the off and middle, pushed back to the bolwer
Moves outside leg stump for the off spinner, waits before cutting it late past backward point
tries to paddle but doesn't make contact and the ball bounds off the pad
on the middle and leg, tapped to short fine leg
tossed up high and full, swung to deep midwicket
goes down the track and drives to long-on
moves down the track for the big hit but ends up slicing a dolly to backward point
flighted on the middle and off, pushed back to the bowler
turning into the middle stump, dabbed to the on side
lunges forward to defend to the on side
low full toss, dipping on Dhoni who drives to long-off
slows up the pace well, Rohit has to wait and he does before swatting it past square leg
hurries down the track and thrashes it hard to left of long-on fielder who dives, gets a hand to it (not a catch, it had bounced) but can't prevent it from running away to the boundary
lunges out to pinch a single with a dab to the off side
kicks off a length and rushes past the outside edge

shuffles across to punch a short of length delivery to the off side and it had rolled towards short mid-off region, had the fielder rushing in from covers picked up the ball cleanly, he would have been run out. But what's more, there is a over throw later
pushes to the off side for a single
short in length, moving towards off stump, guided to third man
bouncing delivery on the middle, Dhoni gets in a tangle, trying to shuffle across, but manages to push it away to the on side for a quick single
Wallop! Suddenly, against the run of play, Rohit backed away a touch and clubbed the short-of-length delivery into the midwicket stands. Biff!
tossed outside leg stump, turned past square leg
moves down the track and flicks it to deep square leg and they run hard to come back for the second
quicker, on the middle, defended to the off side of the pitch

holes out to deep square leg. McCallan cleverly slowed up the pace on this one, tossed it up, Dhoni was down the track and was early into his big swing to the on side. The ball swirled down but the fielder, who initially seemed to misjudge it, does well to lunge out to take the  catch
punched to the on side of the pitch
outside off stump, pushed down to long-off
on the leg stump line, turned to deep midwicket region
full around the off stump, driven to long-off
loopy flighted delivery that dipped on Rohit, who lunged out to push it to cover
comes down the track and pushes it to long-off
quicker one, anticipating the big slog sweep from Yuvraj, but it will be a wide
tosses this up, full, and Yuvraj crashes it powerfully down the pitch and cleans up the stumps at the other end.
We want a six is the chant and Yuvraj drives hard but straight to long-off
slips down the leg side for another wide
flighted outside off, inside edges the drive to his pad and the ball rolls to cover point
Classy inside-out lofted drive to wide long-off to bring up his fifty. He moved outside leg, waited for the flighted ball to arrive before lifting it nonchalantly to the boundary
slowly tossed around the off stump, Rohit waits and waits before late cutting it for the winning run. And the rains come down as well!
